english.segment1: AND . Crucial context . Pressure drops . Unknown heights . I am, I was . Am I was
english.segment2: THE . Absolution . North in the . Whitewall squall . Here is your why . Is your why
english.segment3: REST . Never too late . To Recreate . To mutilate . I'll meet you in . Meet you in
english.segment4: WILL . Desperation . Exit scene . In cold relief
english.segment5: FOLLOW . The hand . The furnace . The straight face .
